I've heard great things about the battery life, but while I'm using it I seem to get only around 2-4 hours out of it. Is this normal? I'm sometimes coding, and occasionally gaming on it. I read somewhere that the first week is full of updates that drain battery, is this true? Finally, the back, top right corner gets hot/loud sometimes. It is usually when I doing something like gaming, but I still was curious as to if it normally gets that hot. Thanks in advance!
